Shivah::

"Agree" said camly the male "Come, I'll show you the place..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest shakes his head. "We have nothing to worry about. That bot 
outside said that he had no association with the Maximals. If he's 
lying, we can tell the Maximals we were misinformed."
> 
> He looks at DrillBit. "I'm ready to go," he says, then looks at 
Shivah, "What part of the base are those bots in?"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Ender::
> >        He was still there silent.  "I have to agree with Killfest 
too.  
> > However, I think we should tone down the slaughter.  The Maximals 
are 
> > complacent right now but they could easily attack us.  If we kill 
too many of 
> > them they may very well do that.  I think we should separate them 
then send a 
> > forged video of the others being killed.  That way they still 
crack without 
> > as much risk to us.  I think Blaze said he(?) was a computer 
specialist.  He 
> > should be able to make an indistinguishable video."
